Abilities: Convert others to Vampires at night.

Attributes:
-Vampires vote at night to bite a target.
-The youngest vampire will visit the target at night.
-You must wait 1 night between conversions.

Goal: Convert everyone who would oppose you.

Investigation Results:
Sheriff - Not Suspicious
Investigator - Your target is covered in blood. They must be a Doctor, Serial Killer, or Vampire.
Consigliere - Your target drinks blood. They must be a Vampire!

Win Conditions:
Win with other Vampires
Win with Witches
Win with Survivors
Must kill the Town
Must kill the Mafia
Must kill Serial Killers
Must kill Arsonists
Must kill Werewolves
